context_bundle.summary: Network optimization for enterprise deployments using BITS (Background Intelligent Transfer Service), BranchCache, CDN, and distribution points to reduce WAN usage

onboarding.quick_start: Enable BITS throttling, configure BranchCache for branch offices, use distribution point groups, implement CDN for global content delivery
common_patterns: BITS: Bandwidth throttling, pause/resume, automatic retry with backoff
BranchCache: Distributed (peer-to-peer) or Hosted (central cache server) modes
MECM Distribution Points: Geographic DP groups, pull DPs for branch offices
Microsoft Connected Cache: Branch office caching for Intune updates
Delivery Optimization: LAN + Internet peer caching (DODownloadMode=99)
CDN: Akamai, Cloudflare for global edge distribution
known_errors: BITS throttling set via registry: MaxTransferRateOnSchedule
BranchCache requires firewall rules: TCP 80, 443, UDP 3702
Pull DPs reduce main office bandwidth but add latency
Delivery Optimization may use metered connections without proper config
